title: Mes Sarcheshmeh Stadium
text: Mes Sarcheshmeh Stadium is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Sarcheshmeh">Sarcheshmeh</a>, <a href="Kerman">Kerman</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches. The stadium was built in 2010 and has a capacity of 15,000 people. <a href="Mes%20Sarcheshmeh%20F.C.">Mes Sarcheshmeh F.C.</a> play their games at the stadium.
